Entries.mletzk.sobble_SobbleSecret/Friendship So: FlashShifter.StardewValleyExpandedCP_Lament/78 76/farmer 73 8 0 Sophia 76 73 1 Sobble 81 73 3/speak Sobble "H-hey Sophia... Thanks for meeting me out here..."/speak Sophia "No problem. What is it you wanted to talk about?"/speak Sobble "U-ummm... W-well... #$b# I-I... #$b# ...I like you..."/speak Sophia "Well of course, I like you too. #$b# We're friends after all!"/speak Sobble "N-n-no... N-not like that... #$b# I-I mean... #$b# I-I... #$b# I l-like like you... #$b# As in... I-I love you... #$b# !!! #$b# I-I-I'm s-sorry... I-I know this is a lot and I-"/speak Sophia "...Sobble... Stop... #$b# I don't know how to tell you... #$b# But I don't feel the same. #$b# I'm sorry... #$b# You're still a great friend friend either way..."/speak Sobble "... #$b# ... #$b# I-I... #$b# I understand... #$b# ..."/ end
Entries.mletzk.sobble_SobbleDate/Friendship Sobb: distantBanjo/78 76/farmer 76 73 1 Sobble 81 73 3/speak Sobble "Hai @! #$b# You're probably wondering why I called you out here... #$b# I wanted to talk about something... #$b# When I asked Sophia out... I only got the courage to do so because of you... #$b# A-and she ended up rejecting me... #$b# Whatever your reason was for asking me to date you, whether it was out of pity or kindness... #$b# It made me realize something... #$b# Whilst I may of had a crush on Sophia... #$b# It was you that stuck by me the whole time... #$b# And now I know... #$b# I love you... #$b# I-I love you so much!~ #$b# I-I don't care if you don't feel the same... #$b# I-I just wanted to let you know... #$b# I-I love you..."/ end
